list.name: Whispered and Lombard Neural Speech Synthesis
list.desc: In this paper, we present and compare various approaches for generating different speaking styles, namely, normal, Lombard, and whisper speech, using only limited data.

list.name: An Empirical Study of CSS Code Smells in Web Frameworks
list.desc: In this thesis, we investigate the prevalence of CSS code smells in websites built with different web frameworks and attempt to recognize a pattern of CSS behavior in these frameworks.
